documentation.text:
@dev Taker withdraws tokens by providing the correct secret
 @param secret The secret that unlocks the escrow
@dev Maker cancels the escrow after the cancellation period

@dev Check if withdrawal is currently possible
 @return true if withdrawal window is open

@dev Check if cancellation is currently possible
 @return true if cancellation is allowed
